name: Robux For Roblox
description:
Are you a big fan of Roblox ? Do you love Roblox Robux ? Do you want to know more about Roblox Robux ? And aspiring to get more Robux ?

You're in the right place, This Roblox Robux Guide App will guide you to know a lot of things about Roblox & Robux !

# What is Robux ?
Robux, stylized as R$, is the sole universal currency on Roblox. Introduced on May 14, 2007, as a replacement of ROBLOX Points, Robux was formerly one of two currencies on the platform alongside Tix (which were removed on April 14, 2016).

Robux is known as Roblox's primary currency by the community and staff; all paid items created by ROBLOX within the catalog are sold for Robux, and user-created content like microtransactions and gamepasses also follow the same rule. The name 'Robux' is a portmanteau of Roblox and "bucks" (bux).

# Remember :
We made this App for Roblox Robux fans, in order to facilitate explain all about Roblox Robux .

# You will find inside the App :
- WHAT IS ROBLOX ?
- WHAT IS ROBUX ?
- ROBUX PRICE
- HOW TO GET FREE ROBUX ?
- ROBUXAT FOR ROBLOX

# Every page guides you to things you maybe was not knowing them before about Roblox Robux !!!

# Disclaimer :
This is an unofficial Roblox Robux App and has NO affiliation with Roblox Corporation™ !!!

+ WE DO NOT SELL ANYTHING INSIDE THE APP.

THIS IS JUST A GUIDE APP THAT EXPLAIN AND GIVES DETAIL SPECIALLY ABOUT ROBUX PRICE.
